verses.roman:
rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam
smarati mano mama kṛta-parihāsam

synonyms: rāse—in the rāsa dance; harim—Śrī Kṛṣṇa; iha—here; vihita-vilāsam—performing pastimes; smarati—remembers; manaḥ—mind; mama—my; kṛta-parihāsam—fond of making jokes.
translation: "Here in the arena of the rāsa dance, I remember Kṛṣṇa, who is always fond of joking and performing pastimes."

purport.content: This verse is quoted from Gīta-govinda (2.3).
